RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOUNTAIN NIGHT TRAIN away well, and held late. ROCN N SPACE dug in late and missed. NORTHFORK THREE TEN closed late. NOT EASY BEING ME interest late. NORTHFORK THREE TEN was reported by the Official Veterinarian as having bled following the running of the race.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Lesser Claiming Races Not Considered In Eligibility). Alberta Bred Claiming Price $5, 000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXAMINER stalked the pace from a rail position, roused nearing the quarter pole, took over entering the stretch, and held. ADRIEN'S AURORA shifted from the rail out to the four path leaving the backstretch, lodged a bid at the quarter pole, rallied into the stretch but was unable to get by the eventual winner. CARSON'S LEGACY set the pace from the three path, moved clear in the far turn, was overtaken at the head of the lane, weakened then was able to hold off DREADNAUGHT for show. DREADNAUGHT lacked the early speed needed and was unable to improve position late. MANFORALLSEASONS sat in range while four to five wide, and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Adrien's Aurora
ENTRY.OWNER: Bar None Ranches Ltd Central City Stables Larocque Darren and Larocque Tanya

ENTRY.NAME: Carson's Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 3w, clear, weakened, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 19500. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR RESTRICTED STAKES RACE IN ALBERTA OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING $17,000. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $17,000. Alberta Bred Claiming Price $22,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKIP'S ROCK broke sharply then quickly took command, drew away in the far turn, remained unchallenged into the stretch, kept to task, and held. SOFIA D 'AMORE shifted out to the four path entering the backstretch, went in pursuit of the leader nearing the quarter pole, and was gaining ground late on the leader. ROSE ROSE ROSE settled inside from just off the rail, chased through the stretch but lacked the kick needed. NO MORE JO KING raced wide after leaving the chute, chased outside through the backstretch, and faded. I SAID QUIET lagged early, and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: No More Jo King
ENTRY.OWNER: No Lucks Given Syndicate Ortiz Cooper and Robertson Jerri R

ENTRY.NAME: Skip's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, drew away, kept task, held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING $25,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 127 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 AB Bred Claiming Price $31,000 .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THESHACK broke alertly then emerged the leader leaving the opening turn, set the early pace under a snug hold from the three path, turned back a challenge from BACKSTREET BOBBY then was given his cue at the quarter pole, and was kept to task under intermittent reminders. EL NOBLE outsprinted in the turn, stalked four wide, was shuffled back leaving the backstretch, chased the leader into the stretch, and finished willingly to prove second best. BACKSTREET BOBBY raced three wide in the opening turn, moved up alongside THESHACK leaving the backstretch, was brushed, and lacked a closing response. GRIGORO settled at the back of the pack, fanned four-wide leaving the backstretch, and tired early. SMART PLAY was under a strong hold leaving the opening turn, sat wide through the backstretch, and was eased.

ENTRY.NAME: Grigoro
ENTRY.COMMENT: back of pack, fanned 4w, tired early

ENTRY.NAME: El Noble
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted, stalked 4w, chased, finished willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Play
ENTRY.OWNER: Kane Tim Robertson Jerri R Hardy Lesley and Chieffo Heather

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR ALBERTA BRED WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Alberta Bred Claiming Price $4,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNTESS CAT sent for speed then angled quickly to the two path, led the field through the turn, responded to a threat from PONY GIRL near the quarter pole, and kicked away through the stretch under brisk confident handling. VIVIEN'S CHARM sat in striking range inside, responded to handling approaching the stretch, and rallied late to earn place honors. PONY GIRL sat in range while four wide, moved up menacingly near the quarter pole, and lacked the rally needed in the drive. FOREVER LADY fanned four wide in the opening turn, and rallied belatedly. SAYGE'S SPIRIT vied early, was shuffled back into the opening turn, was under heavy encouragement into the stretch, and gave way late. WAVESINTHEOCEAN chased five wide and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Vivien's Charm
ENTRY.OWNER: Dialed In Racing Stable Graham Thoroughbreds and Johannsen Kevin

ENTRY.NAME: Sayge's Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, shuffled back, urged, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Countess Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Palma Milton and Roxanne's Racing Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 19500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING $17,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $17,500. Alberta Bred Claiming Price $ 22,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SINGING BELL nestled inside behind the pacesetter, shifted outside approaching the five-sixteenth pole, gained the lead, and held firmly while under pressure from MISCHIEVOUSOFFICER through the stretch. MISCHIEVOUSOFFICER quickly went to the front to lead the field through the backstretch, was overtaken before the quarter pole, was kept under urging but was unable to muster the bid needed in the stretch. JOY IN GRACE chased wide through the backstretch, fanned four wide in the far turn, and rallied belatedly for show. HENRY'S GAMBLE settled four to five wide early, and came up empty in the drive. SUDDENLY MISTY unhurried early, hustled five wide on the final turn but was unable to improve position in the stretch. GRACEFUL SPIRIT chased four wide early, and left nothing in reserve for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Singing Bell
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, gained lead, held firm

ENTRY.NAME: Henry's Gamble
ENTRY.OWNER: Elsener Terry Brown James R and Konyk Jr Bill

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CENTURY MILE RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 10500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR ALBERTA BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,000 (Lesser Claiming Races For $3, 500 (AB $4,500) At Century Mile Not Considered In Eligibility). Alberta Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE CHICAGO sat in striking position from the five path, fanned three wide entering the far turn, set sights on INDEPENDENCE NEIGH at the head of the lane, angled down to the rail then gained a slim lead in the final sixteenth and edged clear. INDEPENDENCE NEIGH zipped to the front, set a pressured pace from the three path, drew clear in the far turn, and was worn down late. SNAP COUNT stalked from the two path, uncoiled a bid after the quarter pole earning show. PULL THE PIN sat between foes in the four path, chased inside through stretch and was out finished for show. FULL VELOCITY saved inside early, shifted outside into the final turn, and bid belatedly. DANZA UNBRIDLED sat in range while wide through the backstretch, and flattened out. HIGH FLYIN TIGER never reached contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Snap Count
ENTRY.OWNER: Salt River Holdings Inc and Viking Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Full Velocity
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved inside, shifted out, late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Pull the Pin
ENTRY.OWNER: Elliott, Madeleine, Langlois, Antoine, Oxley, Sandy and Walper, Deanna

ENTRY.NAME: Independence Neigh
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew clear, worn down

ENTRY.NAME: Little Chicago
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 5w, fanned 3w, angled inside, edged clear
